name: The Dark Planet (Demo)
description:
Walker hates crash landing on quarantined planets, but hey don't we all? Unfortunately, he's not the first or only one, and he soon finds himself amidst a few new friends he doesn't quite care for. The bounty better be worth it.

This is the first glimpse of the Dark Planet, a visual novel by Playpocalypse Games.

Set on an abandoned world of violent storms, alien scavenger gangs and battered scrap cities, Walker must use all his skills of survival and guile to navigate the lawless landscape of Gurn, and uncover the secrets of it's fate, or else be doomed to stay there the rest of his days.

Current build for Windows
Content Warning: Violence and a whole lot of swearing
